Package it.cnr.isti.thematrix.scripting.filtermodule.support

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FilterCondition
    Represents a boolean condition.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AndFilterSequence
    Implements a short-circuited AND which return false if any filter return false
    DiscardFilterCondition
    inverts the semantics of a filter
    DummyFilterCondition
    Implements a lazy AND which return false if any filter return false
    FilterConditions
    provides utility methods to inspect a FilterCondition
    FilterSequence
    a sequence of FilterCondition
    MatchesFilterCondition
    code from http://stackoverflow.com/a/3687031/7849 it works, but it is recursive Fixed to not bomb if passed a null string (but we should trap null fields before here).
    OrFilterSequence
    Implements a short-circuited OR, which returns true if at least one condition is true
    SingleFilterCondition
    Implements an instance of a boolean condition (a predicate) on two given values
